alert.note: Alert for Bradley; Calhoun; Cleveland; Dallas; Drew; Ouachita (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 5:47PM CDT until May 15 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Cleveland County in southeastern Arkansas... Northern Bradley County in southeastern Arkansas... Calhoun County in southwestern Arkansas... Southeastern Dallas County in southwestern Arkansas... Northeastern Ouachita County in southwestern Arkansas... Northwestern Drew County in southeastern Arkansas... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 546 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Toledo to Tipton to near Bearden, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Warren... Fordyce... Rison... Hampton... Bearden... Hermitage... Wilmar... Kingsland... Thornton... Harrell... Ellisville... Harlow... Hampton Municipal Airport... Hebron... Weeks... Brandon... Mt Elba... Tipton... Marks Mill State Park... Toledo... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Bradley; Calhoun; Cleveland; Dallas; Drew; Ouachita
